name: seven-server
description: Seven's Node.js app, packaged for Heroku

BOT_TOKEN.description: Your Discord bot credential, acquired from the Developer Portal.

HTB_EMAIL.description: Your Hack The Box login email address.

HTB_PASS.description: Your personal Hack The Box password (please ensure this password is not used anywhere else, for your own security)

DATABASE_URL.description: The postgres database url (auto-provisioned by Heroku addon) in the format: postgres://db_uname:db_pass@host_ip/db_name

GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS.description: The JSON credential file from GCP for the DialogFlow project's API user, as a string.

GOOGLE_CLOUD_PROJECT.description: The short name / tag that uniquely identifies your DialogFlow project on GCP, e.g. 'seven-huqce'.

ADMIN_DISCORD_ID.description: The ID of the Discord user who will have administrator access to the bot (probably you!).

DISCORD_GUILD_ID.description: The HTB Team's Discord guild ID.

DISCORD_ANNOUNCE_CHAN_ID.description: The ID of the channel (e.g. 'bot') where Seven can send notifications. (Omit if announcements are not desired)

EMOJI_GUILD_ID.description: The ID of the Guild (e.g. 'Seven-Emoji') which Seven can use for storing and retrieving custom emoji.

HTB_TEAM_ID.description: 𝗧𝗘𝗔𝗠 𝗠𝗢𝗗𝗘: The team's ID on HTB (get from the public team profile URL). If a university, leave blank.

HTB_UNIVERSITY_ID.description: 𝗨𝗡𝗜𝗩𝗘𝗥𝗦𝗜𝗧𝗬 𝗠𝗢𝗗𝗘: The university's ID on HTB (get from the public uni profile URL). If a team, leave blank.

IS_HEROKU.description: Indicates to the Node app that Seven is running on Heroku (suppressing certain dev tools).

ACCEPT_HIGHCHARTS_LICENSE.description: Pre-accepts the Highcharts Export Server license for silent deployment.
